jdg.layout

Class FastFR91Layout

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdg.layout.Layout
      • jdg.layout.FastFR91Layout

  • public class FastFR91Layout
extends Layout
    A class implementing the Fruchterman and Reingold method with fast approximatino of repulsive forces (using octrees)
    Version:
    fev 2017
    Author:
    Luca Castelli Aleardi, Ecole Polytechnique

                      double w,

        g - input graph to draw

        C - step length

      • attractiveForce

        Parameters:

      • repulsiveForce

        public double repulsiveForce(double distance)
        Compute the (intensity of the) repulsive force between two nodes at a given distance
        Parameters:
        distance - distance between two nodes

      • computeLayout

        public void computeLayout()
        Perform one iteration of the Force-Directed algorithm. Positions of vertices are updated according to their mutual attractive and repulsive forces.
        Specified by:
        computeLayout in class Layout

        public java.lang.String toString()
